missions.name: Equipment Inspection
missions.description: Robot and all equipment must fit completely in one launch area under 12 in. (305 mm) height limit

choices.description: All equipment fits in one launch area under height limit

missions.name: 01: Surface Brushing

objectives.description: Soil deposits are completely cleared, touching the mat

choices.description: One deposit is cleared
Two deposits are cleared
Archaeologist's brush is not touching the dig site

missions.description: You'll need special tools to clean and uncover buried artifacts without damaging them. Brush away sediment to uncover a piece of this civilization's past.

missions.name: 02: Map Reveal

choices.description: One section is cleared
Two sections are cleared
Three sections are cleared

missions.description: Archaeologists work hard to unearth important clues about how a civilization once lived. Shift and remove topsoil to reveal sections of a hidden map.

missions.name: 03: Mineshaft Explorer

choices.description: Your team's minecart is on the opposing team's field
The opposing team's minecart is on your team's field

missions.description: Ayyana the archaeologist is on a mission to discover every secret of the dig site and share what she finds with her team. Your team's minecart must pass completely through the mineshaft entry to score points for this mission.

missions.name: 04: Careful Recovery

choices.description: Precious artifact is not touching the mine
Both support structures are standing

missions.description: When parts of a site are too dangerous for humans, technology can help safely recover artifacts. Carefully extract the precious artifact from the mine, ensuring the site remains stable.

missions.name: 05: Who Lived Here?

choices.description: Structure floor is completely upright

missions.description: Rebuild the structure to restore a vital part of the village where people once lived.

missions.name: 06: Forge

objectives.description: Ore blocks are not touching the forge

choices.description: One ore block is not touching
Two ore blocks are not touching
Three ore blocks are not touching

missions.description: Ayyana's team believes this forge was used to smelt ore and craft tools. Release the ore blocks and search carefully â€“ one block holds a mysterious artifact waiting to be discovered. Technicians may open ore blocks by hand to reveal the fossilized artifact when completely in home.

missions.name: 07: Heavy Lifting

choices.description: Millstone is no longer touching its base

missions.description: This millstone enabled people to process grain and gives insight into their daily lives. Due to its size and weight, moving this artifact could prove to be a challenge.

missions.name: 08: Silo

objectives.description: Preserved pieces are outside the silo

choices.description: One piece is outside the silo
Two pieces are outside the silo
Three pieces are outside the silo

missions.description: Empty the silo of the preserved food so it can be analyzed at the lab.

missions.name: 09: What's on Sale?

choices.description: Roof is completely raised
Market wares are raised

missions.description: Restore the market stall and reveal items that were once traded between the village and its visitors.

missions.name: 10: Tip the Scales

choices.description: Scale is tipped and touching the mat
Scale pan is completely removed

missions.description: This ancient tool ensured that each item received a fair and balanced price.

missions.name: 11: Angler Artifacts

choices.description: Artifacts are raised above the ground layer
The crane flag is at least partly lowered

missions.description: Your team has discovered some interesting artifacts at the port. Use the crane to excavate the site.

missions.name: 12: Salvage Operation

choices.description: Sand is completely cleared
Ship is completely raised

missions.description: An ancient ship discovered at the beach is at risk of further decay. Excavate the vessel without damaging its delicate structure. Sand is considered completely cleared when the pull activator is past the line on the mat.

missions.name: 13: Statue Rebuild

choices.description: Statue is completely raised

missions.description: Reconstruct the statue to help piece together its historic significance.

missions.name: 14: Forum

choices.description: Brush touching the mat and at least partly in the forum
Topsoil touching the mat and at least partly in the forum
Precious Artifact touching the mat and at least partly in the forum
Opposing Team's Minecart touching the mat and at least partly in the forum
Ore with Fossilized Artifact touching the mat and at least partly in the forum
Millstone touching the mat and at least partly in the forum
Scale Pan touching the mat and at least partly in the forum

missions.description: Deliver artifacts to the forum and choose a significant item to display. Consider what these artifacts tell you and what mysteries remain.

missions.name: 15: Site Marking

objectives.description: Choose how many sites to mark with flags

choices.description: One site with a flag at least partly inside and touching the mat
Two sites with a flag at least partly inside and touching the mat
Three sites with a flag at least partly inside and touching the mat

missions.description: There's so much yet to be discovered at this dig site. Place flags to mark locations for further study. Sites are outlined on the mat wireframe.

missions.name: Precision Tokens

objectives.description: Choose how many precision tokens remain

choices.description: 1 precision token remaining
2 precision tokens remaining
3 precision tokens remaining
4 precision tokens remaining
5 precision tokens remaining
6 precision tokens remaining

missions.description: You begin the match with six precision tokens worth 50 total points. If you interrupt the robot outside of home, the referee will remove one token. You earn points for the number of tokens remaining at the end of the match.
